result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. George T. Britt

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant George T. Britt in court with attorney Jay Englund.  Defendant George T. Britt in custody.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves for matter to be dismissed but read in.  Court dismisses but reads in the case.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 25, 2017 at 11:30 am.
Return date on August 9, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on July 19, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on June 28, 2017 at 08:30 am.
Granting Withdrawal
Preliminary hearing on June 15, 2017 at 11:30 am.

Defendant George T. Britt in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Defendant George T. Britt in custody.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This was set for plea/sentencing.  Atty. Masana states DE wishes another atty. so Atty. Masana wishes to withdraw.  Court allows Atty. Masana to withdraw.  This case has not had a preliminary hearing yet.  Court will set this over for preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 15, 2017 at 11:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 10, 2017 at 09:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 8, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on April 10, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant George T. Britt in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Defendant George T. Britt in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Masana notes matters are resolved.  Will be set for plea hearing in Br 3.  Bond continued.
Return date on December 9, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on November 11, 2016 at 09:45 am.
Return date on November 23, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant George T. Britt by video from LEC with attorney Leonie Dolch.  Defendant George T. Britt in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Dolch has no explanation for missed appearance.  State requests $8,000.00 cash bond.  Atty Dolch requests reasonable suspicion to submit to test and half of cash bond amounts.  $1,000.00 Cash bond.  Special conditions:  Absolute sobriety.  No operating a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Submit to a test if requested by LE based upon reasonable suspicion.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 11, 2016 at 09:45 am.  Return date scheduled for November 23, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Attorney Peter Michael Masana in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court forfeits bond.
body

Attorney Peter Michael Masana in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Masana states he's been unable to reach his client.  There is a warrant out of Dane Co.  Notes JT set for 2/18 in this branch also on another matter.  State requests warrant.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant and orders cash bond forfeiture begin.
Return date at 02-05-2016 01:00 pm

Defendant George T. Britt in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Request time to seek attorney.  Court decides to appoint Attorney Masana to this case as well.  Payments shall continue as is in the other case.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for February 5, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
16R 000379 - Absolute Sobriety

Pre-trial conference at 01-08-2016 10:30 am.
Return date at 01-20-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant George T. Britt appeared by video means from LEC w/atty. Puck Tsai. Prosecuting Atty Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant recv'd and waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  State requests $1500.00 cash bond and sites history.  Atty. Tsai makes bail argument and requests signature bond.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $500.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Absolute Sobriety; Not possess any controlled substances or paraphernalia w/o valid Rx.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 10:30 am.  Return date scheduled for January 20, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
